name: Cultivating Happiness
description:
As you watch TV, an odd commercial comes on, and it really speaks to you. Like, directly.

This game was made for O2A2VNJam 2022! 

  • Under 1k words
  • Fully voice acted (I recommend turning down music volume! Voice lines may not play properly on browser- roll back to get missed lines or wait til 2nd playthrough)
  • 3 endings!

Writing, Programming, Art, VA: Professor Oneira

Music: Steven Andolf on Soundcloud

Background asset:  YoshiYubisashi in CSP material catalogue 

Special thanks to everyone who supported me on stream! <3
